title: Aaron Donald, Kyle Shanahan, Fred Warner, Cam Heyward to serve as NBC pregame analysts for Super Bowl LX

sources.name: Pro Football Talk
sources.title: Aaron Donald, Kyle Shanahan, Fred Warner, Cam Heyward to serve as NBC pregame analysts for Super Bowl LX
sources.description: The last time NBC broadcast the Super Bowl, Aaron Donald effectively ended the game by pressuring Joe Burrow on fourth-and-1 to force an incompletion and a turnover on downs, sealing the Rams' victory.
